long_description: Expand your backcountry cooking capabilities with the Jetboil FluxRing(R) Fry Pan-it's a great upgrade! Partnered with the Jetboil Personal Cooking System, pot support and stabilizer, it creates a convenient system for a campsite stir-fry or saute. Patent-pending FluxRing heat exchanger increases efficiency and evenly distributes heat. Curved walls won't inhibit the flipping of your favorite pancakes. Protective FluxRing cover reduces the risk of burns and lets you put the hot pan down on any surface; doubles as a plate for preparation or eating. Hard-anodized aluminum resists wear and cleans up easily. Pan features heat-resistant fold-out handles for a secure grip. Intended for use with the Jetboil cooking systems (sold separately). If you own the Jetboil Personal Cooking System, you will need to purchase the Jetboil Pot Support and Stabilizer Kit (sold separately).
short_description: Expand your backcountry cooking capabilities with the Jetboil FluxRing(R) Fry Pan-it's a great upgrade!
